name: Got it - lol z girls surprise
name_original: Got it - lol z girls surprise
description:
Surprise Eggs is an entertaining and fun game designed for children of any age. If your child likes surprises and toys, here he can enjoy all the content, with a lot of levels where he must open all the chocolate eggs to get his star surprise.

At the farm, some prize claws have given us a lot of gifts to open, discover what's inside them just by crushing them. Quote in your mind any gift you expect and you will find it.


**FEATURES**

- Open as many as you can and collect the surprises.

- A lot of surprises to collect accompanied by a splendid music.

- High probability of any surprises coming up.

- Random backgrounds.


How to play?

Select one of the eggs that appear on the level and press to print, then remove the wrapper and touch it with your finger to eat it.

Now all that remains is to open the box and wait for luck with your surprise.
Collect them all! and get the most difficult figure.

Discover all the possible collectibles and enjoy all their ladybug, strawberry and many more backgrounds, accompanied by pleasant sounds and beautiful nursery rhymes to make the experience of getting the mysterious gift entertaining.

If you like it, don't forget to comment on your experience so you can improve day after day. Share it with family and friends, it will be helpful to know their opinions.



Complete Surprise Eggs application:

- If you prefer eliminate ads, you can also buy the full contents of the application with a single payment of $4.99. The price may vary depending on the country.
- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account on your purchase confirmation.
